PoolMethods
 
Packageframework.cache
Classpublic class Pool
InheritancePool Object

The Pool is a collection of object pools, or a way to keep track of the objects that are created and destroyed often. It is much faster to reuse instances of objects than to create new ones all of the time

Method Detail
getPool()method
public function getPool(clazz:Class):Obj

This method returns a reference to the pool related to a Class object.

Parameters

clazz:Class — A Class object of the pool that you are interested in the object pool for.

Returns
Obj — Returns an Obj object for managing this Classes pool.
retrieve()method 
public function retrieve(clazz:Class, ... params):*

This method returns an instance of the class that you send in.

Parameters

clazz:Class — The class that you would like to retrive an instance of.
 
... params — a rest argument of any of arguments that you want to send into your instance.

Returns
* — Returns an instance of the Class that you pass in.
